entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 30 except minus 34 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 30 except minus 34 inland. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
